Package com.sc.hm.otl.core.ctx

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ContextAdapter
    An adapter interface in order to allow two unrelated/uncommon interfaces to work together.
    ContextProvider
    Interface to represent a third party context provider.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ContextProviderFactory
    Factory class to find a ContextProvider.
    NoOpContextAdapter
    A simple adapter will store the contextual value in the current threadlocal.
    OTLContext
    This class hides and serves as a substitute for the underlying thread context implementation of any provider.
